items.content_html: Put the micro.blog Mac app on my work machine, but I’m on Sierra. Considering going rogue and upgrading to HS before IT approves it.
The Working Copy iOS app is quite a wonder. It’s a full git client on my phone & tablet!
Yay for minor dental surgery. Here’s to soft foods for the next week.

Working with @FrontierCorp billing is almost worse than @ComcastCares. Signed up for a 2 year plan and they didn’t tell me my promo price ($79) was for 6 months and would go up to $114 for the rest of my “2 year term”, after which I can re-negotiate for any promo.
Dear Collection View, why won’t you reload cells when I tell you to reload a section? I really want you to animate this change. Sincerly, me
I just discovered that there’s a free express version of Capture One for Sony camera users. Looking forward to playing with it as a better importer than Photos.app.
If anyone has experience linking multiple static frameworks into a dylib, I’d be greateful if you would look over this question on Stack Overflow.
Watching playoff baseball with our poor sick baby boy resting on me. These Yankee games take for freaking ever.
Trying to migrate from CocoaPods to a Carthage Static Framework is much more challenging than I anticipated.

Thanks to @timothyekl for pointing me in the right direction. Now I’ve got an external_bash_profile that syncs in iCloud Drive across my machines, and I can maintain some sanity when context switching.
